details.title: Best practices for certifying IMA systems in civil aircraft
details.abstract: Integrated modular avionics (IMA) systems are being installed on a number of new and modified aircraft. This provides a definition of IMA, an overview of the existing IMA certification guidance, and seven keys for successful implementation and certification of IMA systems. Additionally, this addresses some major certification concerns that should be considered by IMA manufacturers, aircraft applicants, and certification authorities when developing, selecting, or approving IMA technology.
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
